title: Taco Bell Seasoning Copycat Recipe
description: Copycat Taco Bell seasoning is fast and simple to make and will make your tacos taste like the popular Mexican chain for an easy taco Tuesday dinner.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines Latin American Mexican Taco Bell Seasoning Copycat 4.5 (136) 117 Reviews 26 Photos Copycat Taco Bell seasoning is easy to make. This recipe makes enough to season one pound of ground beef. Submitted by FoodUnlcom Updated on May 22, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 26 26 26 26 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 tablespoon dried onion flakes 1 teaspoon all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon beef bouillon granules 1 teaspoon garlic salt 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoon paprika 1 teaspoon chili powder ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper ¼ teaspoon white sugar Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Whisk together onion flakes, flour, bouillon granules, garlic salt, cumin, paprika, chili powder, cayenne pepper, and sugar in a bowl. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 424 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 15 Calories 0g Fat 3g Carbs 1g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 15 % Daily Value * Total Fat 0g 1% Saturated Fat 0g 1% Cholesterol 0mg 0% Sodium 571mg 25% Total Carbohydrate 3g 1% Dietary Fiber 1g 2% Total Sugars 1g Protein 1g 1% Vitamin C 2mg 2% Calcium 11mg 1% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 58mg 1% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Taco Bell Seasoning Copycat 01 of 26 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 26 Photo by  Tina 08/14/2023 It was good- just used regular garlic powder and a punch of salt. A pinch more of chili powder too. It will be fine! Saved me a trip to the store 😊 03 of 26 Photo by  reshonda31 10/14/2022 This recipe is great. However I didn’t add the flour, but it taste authentic. I will no longer purchase Taco Bell seasoning. Thanks for sharing! 04 of 26 Photo by  Karem Clark 12/03/2021 05 of 26 Photo by  Tonya Putman 08/18/2021 06 of 26 Photo by  Rae Vogler 06/30/2021 Just a note for thought. I use all co-op ingredients. Be careful with the Cayenne. It was way too hot. Made this time and time again and stored large quantities in a mason jar. 07 of 26 Photo by  Carson Bevan 01/23/2021 Was this a good taco seasoning, Absolutely. Was this Taco Bell Seasoning, No. I believe that if you like the taste of Taco Bell seasoning, then you will also enjoy this. It is a bit spicy for some people though. This is now my “go-to” recipe for taco seasoning. I could not find onion flakes so I used 1tsp. of onion powder. I also used liquid “better than bouillon” and It still tasted fantastic. 08 of 26 Photo by  Eaf78 01/19/2021 I used onion powder because it’s what I had, other than that I didn’t change anything. This was good, I will make it again. 09 of 26 Photo by  Pat J 05/17/2020 10 of 26 Photo by  Robert Landry 04/26/2020 I have tried multiple taco seasoning recipes and this one is by far the best! I absolutely love it! I’ve made a huge jar of it so that my wife and kids can easily use it whenever I’m not home. When I cook it I typically use 1 pound of pork and 1 pound of ground turkey and use this recipe per pound. When the ground meat is cooked I will find myself just sitting there eating it straight out of the pot. It is so delicious. 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Homemade Taco Seasoning Mix 55 Ratings Famous Taco Seasoning Mix 118 Ratings Restaurant-Style Taco Meat Seasoning 303 Ratings Homemade Taco Seasoning 19 Ratings Homemade Taco Seasoning Mix 515 Ratings Taco Seasoning (without the chili powder) 87 Ratings Ground Turkey Taco Meat 231 Ratings Kate's Kickin' Spice Blend 2 Ratings Berbere Spice Blend 18 Ratings Grilled Avocado and Veggie Tacos Beefy Naked Burrito Skillet 17 Ratings Homemade Chicken Fajitas 31 Ratings Ron's Rib Rub 1 Rating Chili Lime Chicken 19 Ratings Blackened Seasoning Mix 184 Ratings Lentil Tacos 21 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
